name: Infernal Shadowrunner
description:
My first 3D game, Infernal Shadowrunner, entails hurtling through a void sparsely filled with dimly lit platforms.  Quick sprints and jumps are necessary to escape the encroaching "firewall".  Landing on a platform lights the orb at that platform and grants a point.  After collecting one hundred points throughout multiple plays, the surrounding landscape can be themed using an RGBA color wheel.  

I created this game to learn more about 3D game development in Godot.  The gameplay is simple but satisfying.
